select t.* from exp_expense_type t where t.type_flag = 1 and t.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} and t.enabled = 1 and t.deleted = 0
AND 1 = 1
AND exists (select 1 from exp_accrual_expense_type a where a.exp_expense_id = t.id and a.exp_accrual_type_id = #{typeId})
AND t.name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND t.code like concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')

select * from exp_accrual_type et where exists ( select 1 from exp_accrual_company ec where et.id = ec.exp_accrual_type_id and ec.company_id = #{companyId} and ec.enable_flag = 1 ) and et.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} and et.enable_flag = true and ( et.visible_user_scope = '1001' or( et.visible_user_scope = '1002' and exists ( select 1 from exp_accrual_type_assign_dp ed where ed.exp_accrual_type_id = et.id and ed.department_id = #{departmentId} ) ) or et.visible_user_scope = '1003' )
